reviewText: Great footage, interesting information and an entertaining presenter.
I can't wait to see it. But it is in wrong format European(dont remember being warned) for me to see it. It will play on my computer as you van change dvd formats 5 times for being locked into one

I have watched this video before when I was in China. I purchased it there and somehow it got misplaced. One of my children may have it but I don't know so after a long search I found it on Amazon. Now the problem is it is Blu-ray whatever that is and won't play on my Macbook, my daughter's DVD player, my portable DVD player and my son's DVD player. Anyway, I guess you need a Blu-ray device in order to play it so be forewarned. It is an awesome documentary and if I can ever get to see it again, I am going to fully enjoy it.
